title: Divyam Diamond Jadau Haaram with Emerald Accents
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with brilliant-cut diamonds of VS clarity and G color. Features ethically sourced Emeralds and Rubies.
features: This stunning Haaram showcases intricate Jadau craftsmanship, a hallmark of Hyderabadi jewelry. The undulating design of the necklace is set with dazzling diamonds. The central pendants feature a floral motif, meticulously crafted with Polki diamonds, emeralds, and rubies. Delicate gold bead drops (Gutti Pusalu inspired) enhance the overall opulence.
colors: Predominantly gold with sparkling white diamonds
complemented by the rich green of the emeralds and the vibrant red of the rubies – a traditionally auspicious color palette.
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations like weddings (Vivaham)
and other significant cultural events. Can also be styled for modern
high-end parties seeking a touch of traditional elegance.
description: Exquisite Hyderabadi Jadau craftsmanship ensures exceptional quality and lasting beauty. The use of high-quality diamonds, emeralds, and rubies elevates its value. This Haaram is a timeless heirloom, embodying the rich cultural heritage of South India while appealing to contemporary sensibilities. It’s a statement piece that radiates sophistication and traditional grace.
